document.full_text: the bowl championship series has chosen dates for its five bowl games in an effort to avoid conflicts that could arise because of the nfl lockout, with flexibility to move the title game.
document.title: wary of n.f.l. lockout, b.c.s. selects bowl dates
lines_and_colors: the bowl championship series has chosen dates for its five bowl games in an effort to avoid conflicts that could arise because of the nfl lockout, with flexibility to move the title game.
